item.description: Hands-on session to create Dynamic NFTs, using rules that will guide your NFT to be dynamic. Know some tools that help you to implement them, like Chainlink Automation and Functions. Get tips and techniques for updating NFTs on chain.
item.title: Tips and Tools to Create Dynamic NFTs
